p: fisher.test() function from the R base package has been used for all the statistical tests. To test the significance of C-to-U bias on the positive strand, we compared C>T/G>A SNV counts to the count of C/G bases on the reference genome. For P values of “RNA vs Reference,” “DNA vs Reference,” and “genome vs RNA,” 2 × 2 contingency tables have been generated as shown in data S2.
